malariaHouseMoquitoInstUI.attribute: Total Mosquitoes with Malaria inside the House

toggleInstUI.attribute: Toggle between Windowed and Fullscreen Mode

greeting.attribute: Congratulations, you have been elected the new mayor of Pleasantville! Pleasantville is a wonderful place, but it has one big problem: malaria. Help the residents of your town develop an effective strategy to fight malaria. First, have a look around and identify different ways to combat malaria. Then spend your resources wisely. Afterwards, we will see how well you protected your town.

daylightHours.attribute: There are not enough daylight hours left!

inspectBarrel.attribute: You see a barrel full of water. Would you like to cover the barrel?

inspectCoveredBarrel.attribute: Would you like to uncover the barrel?

purchaseCover.attribute: It takes one hour to construct a cover for the barrel.

refundCover.attribute: One hour has been refunded to you.

inspectDoor.attribute: You see an open door. Would you like to close it?

inspectClosedDoor.attribute: Would you like to open the door?

purchaseClosedDoor.attribute: Fifteen minutes pass as the residents and you discuss the benefits of closing their door at night to keep mosquitoes out.

refundClosedDoor.attribute: Fifteen minutes have been refunded to you.

inspectWindow.attribute: You see an open window. Would you like to install a mosquito screen or close it?

inspectScreenWindow.attribute: Would you like to remove the mosquito screen?

inspectClosedWindow.attribute: Would you like to open the window?

inspectScreenClosedWindow.attribute: Would you like to remove the mosquito screen or open the window?

purchaseScreenWindow.attribute: It takes you one hour to install a mosquito screen.

refundScreenWindow.attribute: One hour has been refunded to you.

purchaseClosedWindow.attribute: The window shutters are rusted in place. It takes you thirty minutes to oil and adjust them.

refundClosedWindow.attribute: Thirty minutes have been refunded to you.

inspectClinic.attribute: You see a clinic. You can stock the clinic with both rapid diagnostic tests (RDTs) and Artemisinin-based combination therapies (ACTs).

purchaseRDT.attribute: It takes two hours to stock the RDTs.

refundRDT.attribute: Two hours have been refunded to you.

purchaseACT.attribute: It takes two hour to stock the ACTs.

refundACT.attribute: Two hours have been refunded to you.

inspectHouse.attribute: You see a house. Would you like to deliver a new mosquito net, or if there is a damaged mosquito net it can be repaired?

purchaseNet.attribute: It takes one hour to deliver and hang the mosquito net.

refundNet.attribute: One hour has been refunded to you.

purchaseRepair.attribute: You use a needle and thread to sew up each small hole. Thirty minutes have passed.

refundRepair.attribute: Thirty minutes have been refunded to you.

simulationGreeting.attribute: The town darkens as night approaches and the buzz of mosquitoes drowns out all other noises.

transmissionEvent.attribute: Malaria has spread from one resident to another! Everyone with a fever should be tested for malaria.

mosquitoPopulationEvent.attribute: The mosquito population has doubled! Mosquitoes lay their eggs in water. Make sure to cover those barrels!

RDTEvent.attribute: The clinic has no RDTs! The residents cannot be diagnosed.

ACTEvent.attribute: The clinic has no ACTs! The residents cannot receive treatment for malaria.

RDTACTEvent.attribute: The clinic has no RDTs or ACTs! The residents cannot be diagnosed or receive treatment for malaria.

closedDoorEvent.attribute: No doors have been closed! Simply closing a door is an effective way to reduce mosquitoes inside a house.

purchaseEvent.attribute: No mosquito nets were purchased! Mosquito nets are one of the most effective ways to protect people from malaria.

repairEvent.attribute: No repairs have been made to damaged mosquito nets! A needle and thread can be used to sew up small holes in a damaged mosquito net.

purchaseRepairEvent.attribute: No mosquito nets were purchased or repaired! Mosquito nets are one of the most effective ways to protect yourself. A needle and thread can be used to sew up small holes in a damaged mosquito net.

screenEvent.attribute: No windows have screens! A screen is a permanent way to reduce the mosquitoes inside a house.

closedWindowEvent.attribute: No windows have been closed! Simply closing a window is an effective way to reduce mosquitoes inside a house.

screenClosedWindowEvent.attribute: No windows have a screen or have been closed! A screen is a permanent way to reduce the mosquitoes inside a house. Simply closing a window is effective as well.

simulationFinishedEvent.attribute: The sound of a rooster crowing replaces the buzz of mosquitoes as morning approaches. Let's check the results and see how you did combating malaria!

didYouKnow0.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? A mosquito needs your blood for her eggs to develop? Squash her!

didYouKnow1.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? A mosquito net has to be tucked in on all sides of the bed to be effective.

didYouKnow2.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? Women are four times more likely to get malaria while pregnant.

didYouKnow3.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? If you ever have malaria, remember to take ACTs and not other medicines.

didYouKnow4.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? The most common symptoms of malaria are high fever, chills, headache, body aches, and tiredness. Nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea may also occur.

didYouKnow5.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? Even if you are young and healthy, you still need to sleep under a mosquito net because you can spread the disease to others who are not young and healthy.

didYouKnow6.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? Malaria is caused by a parasite carried by the female Anopheles mosquito. When she bites someone who is infected with malaria and then bites another person, she transfers the disease.

didYouKnow7.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? If you ever have malaria, remember that even if you begin to feel better, you MUST continue to take your medicine as the doctor says or the infection will not go away completely.

didYouKnow8.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? If left untreated, malaria can develop into a more virulent form of the disease. Symptoms of a complication include jaundice, unconsciousness, inability to sit, convulsions, and shallow breathing. Brain damage may develop.

didYouKnow9.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? The surest way to know whether you have malaria is visit your doctor and take a diagnostic test.

didYouKnow10.attribute: DID YOU KNOW? Anopheles mosquitoes are most active between dusk and dawn.

malariaHouseMoquitoInstUI.attribute: Ny fitambaranan'ireo moka ahazoana tazo moka anatiny trano

escInstUI.attribute: *Miala sasatra kely sa tamperina ny lalao

toggleInstUI.attribute: *Fifamadiaha ny varavaran kely sy ny fihovana ny fahita lavitra maventy

greeting.attribute: Arahabaina, ianao dia voafidy ho ben'ny tananan'ny Tsaratanana! Tsaratanana dia toerana iray mahafinaritra, kanefa manana olana goavana iray: tazomoka. Ampio ireo mponina ao amin'ny tanana misy anao mba hampandroso tetikady iray hiadiana amin'ny tazomoka. Voalohany, jereo ny manodidina ary fantaro ireo fomba samihafa hiadiana amin'ny tazomoka. Ampiasao ampahendrena ny fanananao. Rehefa avy eo, ho hitanay eo ahoana no mba fiarovanao ny tanananao.

daylightHours.attribute: Efa tsy misy hazavana be intsomy sisa!

inspectBarrel.attribute: Mahita barika feno rano ianao. Afaka mandrakotra ilay barika ve ianao?

inspectCoveredBarrel.attribute: Afaka manokotria ilay barika ve ianao?

purchaseCover.attribute: Eo amin'ny ora iray eo ny fotoana lany hanamboatra nakotra barika.

inspectDoor.attribute: Mahita varavarana misokatra ianao. Afaka mamody azy ve ianao?

purchaseClosedDoor.attribute: Efa naharitra dimy ambin'ny folo minitra ny fotoana ninesahanao sy ilay tompontrano momba ny tombotsoan'ny famodiany ny varavarana mandritra ny alina mba hiarovana ny moka tsy hotafiditra an-trano.

refundClosedDoor.attribute: Manana dimy ambiny folo minitra ianao.

inspectWindow.attribute: Mahita varavaran-kely misokatra ianao. Afaka mametaka giriazy na mamody ilay varavaran-kely ve ianao?

inspectScreenWindow.attribute: Afaka manala ilay giriazy ve ianao?

inspectScreenClosedWindow.attribute: Afaka ve ny hanaisotra io giriazy na koa hanokatra ny varavaran-kely?

purchaseScreenWindow.attribute: Maharitra eo amin'ny ora iray ny fametahana lay.

purchaseClosedWindow.attribute: Harafesina ampitoerana ny varavaran-kely misy ridao. Mila telopolo minitra ianao hanosorana diloilo azy mba hampandeha azy tsara.

inspectClinic.attribute: *Mahita hopitaly ianao. Azonao tehirizina ao ny TDRs fitaovam-pitiliana malaky sy ny fanofody ACTs.

purchaseRDT.attribute: Ora roa no fitehirizana ny TDRs.

purchaseACT.attribute: Mila roa ora ny fitehirizana ny ACTs.

inspectHouse.attribute: Mahita trano iray ianao. Moa ve afaka manatitra lay vaovao iray ianao, na manjaitra raha misy lay rovitra.

purchaseNet.attribute: Ora iray no ilaina amin'ny fanaterana sy ny fametahana ny lay.

purchaseRepair.attribute: Fanjaitra sy kofehy no entina hanampenana ny lavaka kely tsirairay. Telopolo minitra no lasa izay.

simulationGreeting.attribute: Mihamaizana ny tanana raha tonga ny hariva ary tsy zavatra heno afa tsy ny feon'ny moka.

transmissionEvent.attribute: Ny tazo mahery dia avy amin'ny olona ka mifindra any amin'ny hafa. Ny olona izay tratra ny tazo dia tokony hanaovana fitiliana momba ny tazo mahery.

mosquitoPopulationEvent.attribute: Nitombo avo roa eny ny habetsahan'ny moka. Anatiny rano no ametrahan'ny moka ny atodiny. Aza hadinoina ny manarona ireny fitaovana ireny.

RDTEvent.attribute: Ny toeram-pitsaboana manokana dia tsy manana ireny fitaovam-pitiliana malaky ireny! Tsy afaka atao ny mitily ny olona.

ACTEvent.attribute: Tsy manana ACTs ny tobi-pahasalamanana! Tsy afaka mandray fitsaboana ho hiarovana aretina tazo moka ireo mponina ireo.

RDTACTEvent.attribute: Tsy manana TDRs na ACTs ny tobi-pahasalamanana! Tsy afaka mitily na mahazo fitsaboana ireo ponina amin'ny aretina tazomoka.

closedDoorEvent.attribute: Tsy misy varavarana mihidy! Ny famodiana fotsiny ny varavarana dia fomba iray mahomby hiarovana ny fanaroan'ny moka ao an-trano.

purchaseEvent.attribute: Tsy misy lay ialam-bola! Ny lay dia anisan'ny fomba iray mahomby miara ny olona amin'ny tazo moka.

repairEvent.attribute: Tsy misy fanamboarina tamin'ny lay izay simba! Ny fanjaitra sy filo (taretry) mety ampiasana mba hanjahirana ireo rovitra.

purchaseRepairEvent.attribute: Tsy misy lay ialam-bola na amboarina! Ny lay dia anisan'ny ireo fomba tena mahomby hafahanao miaro tena. Ny fanjaitra sy ny bofehy dia afaka ampiasaina mba hanampenana ireo lavaka bely amin'ny lay.

screenEvent.attribute: Tsy misy varavaran-kely misy fitaratra! Ny Fitaratra dia fomba iray maharitra entina ampihenana ny moka ao antrano.

closedWindowEvent.attribute: Tsy misy mihidy ny varavaran-kely. Ny fanidihana ny varavaran-kely dia fomba tsotra sady mahomby manena ny moka ao an-trano.

screenClosedWindowEvent.attribute: Tsy misy giriazy na mihidy ny varavaran-kely! Ny giriazy dia fomba maharitra manena ny moka ao an-trano. Fomba mahomby iany koa ny fanidihana ny varavaran-kely.

simulationFinishedEvent.attribute: Misolo ny feon'ny akoholahy ny feon'ny moka rehefa akaiky ny maraina. Ndeha hojerena ny voketra sy ny fomba hidadihanao any tazo moka!

didYouKnow0.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Mila ny ranao ny moka hitombon'ny atodiny.

didYouKnow1.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny lay dia tsy maintsy apetaka amin'ny zoron'ny fandriana avy mba hahomby.

didYouKnow2.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny vehivavy bevohoka dia mora tratry ny tazo moka.

didYouKnow3.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Raha efa voan'ny tazo moka ianao, aza adino mihinana ACTs fa tsy fanafody hafa.

didYouKnow4.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny ahafantarana ny tazo moka matetika dia tazo moka mahery vaika, mangatsiaka, aretin'andoha, marary vatana, reraka, te handoa, avy indraindray fivalanana.

didYouKnow5.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Na tanora salama aza ianao dia ilaina ihany ny fatoriana ao anaty lay misy fanafody moka satria mety miely any amin'ny olon-drehetra na tanora sy salama aza ny aretina.

didYouKnow6.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny tazo moka dia azo avy amin'ny kaikitra ny mokavavy. Rehefa manaikitra olona marary ilay moka dia mamindra aretina any amin'ny olona salama indray amin'ny alalan'ny kaikitra.

didYouKnow7.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Raha mbola tsy voan'ny tazo mihintsy ianao, tadidio fa na dia mahatsapa miha salama ianao dia tokony hanoy hatrany ny fihimanana fanafody toromasiky ny mpitsabro satria mety mbola tsy sitrana tanteraka ianao.

didYouKnow8.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Raha tsy tsaboina ny tazo moka dia mety lasa tazo mahery vaika. Soritra iray ahafantarana ny fiombron'ny aretina ny angorosy, tsy fahatsiasovana tena, tsy fihetezana mipetraka, fanintona ary faharivon'ny fiaina. Izany dia mety hampitombo ny fahasimban'ny atidoha.

didYouKnow9.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny fomba azo antoka ahafantarano,fa voan'ny tazo moka ianao dia ny manatana dokotera sy manao fitiliana.

didYouKnow10.attribute: Fantatrao ve? Ny mokavavy Anopheles dia matetika mivoaka eo anelanelan'ny harivariva sy divaraina.
